prompt: Write a compelling short story about a character who discovers they can communicate with plants. Include dialogue and vivid descriptions of the natural world.
Draft a professional email to a client explaining a project delay, including an apology, explanation of the issue, revised timeline, and steps being taken to prevent future delays.
Analyze the following dataset and provide insights on trends, patterns, and recommendations. Include visualizations if possible and explain your methodology.
Conduct a competitive analysis of the top 5 companies in [industry]. Compare their strengths, weaknesses, market position, and identify opportunities for differentiation.
Create a reusable React component for a modal dialog with the following features: backdrop click to close, escape key support, focus management, and customizable content.
Design a responsive navigation menu that works on both desktop and mobile devices. Include hover effects, smooth transitions, and accessibility features.
Design a RESTful API for a blog application. Include endpoints for posts, comments, users, and authentication. Provide example requests and responses.
Create a database schema for an e-commerce platform including tables for products, users, orders, and inventory. Include relationships and constraints.
Create a week's worth of engaging social media posts for a sustainable fashion brand. Include captions, hashtags, and content ideas for Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
Write a welcome email series for new subscribers to a fitness app. Include 3 emails: welcome message, feature highlights, and motivation/tips.
Develop a comprehensive marketing campaign for launching a new mobile app. Include target audience, messaging, channels, timeline, and success metrics.
Create a hands-on science lesson plan for middle school students about renewable energy. Include objectives, materials, activities, and assessment methods.
Design an interactive English lesson about persuasive writing techniques. Include examples, practice exercises, and a final writing assignment.
Create a comprehensive quiz on [topic] with multiple choice, short answer, and essay questions. Include an answer key with explanations.
